logic.tile

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.tile.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for modeling a tile.
    Author:
    Andrei Letavin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • canJumpOver

        public boolean canJumpOver(Piece piece)
        Determines if a given piece can jump over the tile.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece trying to jump over.
        Returns:
        true if it can jump over and false otherwise.

      • canPieceEnter

        public boolean canPieceEnter(Piece toPlace)
        Determines if a piece can enter a square.
        Parameters:
        toPlace - The piece trying to enter the tile.
        Returns:
        true if the piece can enter and false otherwise.

      • placePiece

        public Piece placePiece(Piece toPlace)
        Attempts to place a piece onto the tile. Will also set the piece's location to be the same as the current tile.
        Parameters:
        toPlace - The piece trying enter the tile.
        Returns:
        The piece that was taken as a result of the new piece entering the tile and null if no piece was taken.

      • removePiece

        public Piece removePiece()
        Removes the piece from the tile.
        Returns:
        Return the piece currently on the tile if there is any present. Otherwise, return null.

      • getLocation

        public Coordinate getLocation()
        Returns the location of the current tile.
        Returns:
        The _location.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Coordinate location)
        Sets the location to whatever value is passed in without validation.
        Parameters:
        location - The value to set the tile's _location to.

      • getPlacedPiece

        public Piece getPlacedPiece()
        Returns the piece placed on this tile.
        Returns:
        The piece placed on this tile if there is any. Otherwise, null is returned.

      • setPlacedPiece

        public void setPlacedPiece(Piece placedPiece)
        Sets the piece currently on this tile to whatever value is passed in without validation.
        Parameters:
        placedPiece - The piece to place onto the tile
